item.title: Over The Hill closed playtest taking place next week
item.content:encoded:
Funselektor Labs Inc has announced that there will be a closed playtest for its offroading game Over the Hill, with this playtest taking place between October 24th and October 26th. Anyone interested in the Over the Hill closed playtest, will need to sign up to the Discord channel through which applications will be handled.

Over the Hill is a game about offroading in which players drive vehicles from the 60s to 80s either alone or in a group, while dealing with the challenges that come with navigating some tough trails. It is not just the landscape that will provide a challenge, with Over the Hill featuring dynamic weather and a day/night cycle. The different areas are inspired by real world locations, each filled with different objectives. Completing these objectives will unlock new vehicles, upgrades, customisations, and cosmetics. And, you can capture the scenery through a photo mode.

A date for the full release of Over the Hill is yet to be confirmed.

Source: Steam



https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/10/13/over-the-hill-closed-playtest-taking-place-next-week/

item.title: Of Ash and Steel will launch on November 6th
item.content:encoded:
TinyBuildGames and developer Fire & Frost have announced that the open world RPG Of Ash and Steel will be launching on November 6th for PC, and a demo has been released for Steam Next Fest. The game is being billed as an old school RPG where players will explore the Kingdom of the Seven without mission markers or overt quest guidance.

The demo for Of Ash and Steel will feature an area of the game that can be explored including an abandoned village, of which you can try and solve the mystery of what happened. There will be a part of the main quest available to play along with side missions, and players will also be able to delve into the skill trees, various professions, and the upgrades. Players can experiment with different combat styles from being light footed to wearing a full suit of armour while wielding a giant weapon. In addition to the campaign, there is also an Arena mode where players can earn gear, gold, and XP. There are also ranks to climb to defeat more powerful enemies, and become the champion of the arena.

The system requirements for Of Ash and Steel are as follows.

MINIMUM:

    • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core i5 10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 45 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD recommended

RECOMMENDED:

    • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700 / AMD Ryzen 7 3700x
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 / AMD Radeon RX 6700
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 45 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD recommended

Source: YouTube



https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/10/13/of-ash-and-steel-will-launch-on-november-6th/
